api_list.name: General Question and Answer
api_list.description: This endpoint takes text content and answers questions based on the content.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pathx-all.p.rapidapi.com/qa"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pathx-all.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://pathx-all.p.rapidapi.com/qa"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
